Description (short)
Definition of port to use by pop3 client and server cores.
Written by
Andreas Kupries
Description
Definition of port to use by pop3 client and server cores. Might be overidden for testing purposes.
Depends on
Tcl
Keywords
POP3, port definition for POP3
  • ::pool::pop3::port ()

::pool::pop3::port ()
This command returns the port to be used by clients (net/pop3/pop3.cls. Its redefinition allows usage of a different port for testing purposes; and is simpler than the implementation of a -port option.
